effects.display_string: Set: Each time you take damage you have a chance to cast Icebound Fortitude for 4 sec and gain Luck of the Draw! which increases your damage dealt by 15% for 12 sec.

Set: Luck of the Draw! has 2 sec increased duration.

While Luck of the Draw! is active, Death Strike costs 10 less Runic Power and can strike up to 2 additional nearby enemies.

spell.description: Use: Increase your speed for a few seconds. (2 Min Cooldown)

sockets.display_string: +181 Primary Stat and +0.15% Critical Effect per unique Algari gem color

spells.description: Equip: Embrace the darkness. Double the effects of your other Nerubian embellished item, positive and negative.

spells.description:
Equip: Advance to the 50 Verses of Inner Resilience, reading as you are attacked.
Inner Resilience increases your armor by 3,311 and grants your attacks a chance to invoke a ward which absorbs 839,107 Magic damage. When finished, sift through the passages to another chapter.
Use: Sift through the passages in the tome with increased Radiance. (1 Min 30 Sec Cooldown)

Equip: Your abilities have a very high chance to lash out with a Hateful Strike, inflicting 154,657 Physical damage to an enemy and healing you for 9,062. These effects are increased by 100% while you are below 35% health.

spell.description: Use: Reduces your falling speed for 30 sec. (1 Min Cooldown)

spells.description: Equip: Don the mantle of the Trashmaster.

enchantments.display_string: Enchanted: Rune of the Fallen Crusader

spells.description: Equip: Your damaging spells and abilities have a chance to deal 117,913 damage to your target. The magic school chosen is based upon your selection of socketed Khaz Algar gems.
